name: LZRS
description:
Dodge the lasers and get to the end.

Built for #lowrezjam! Try to go fast and not die.

Arrow keys move, up/space jumps.

(For the purposes of the competition, in the browser, ignore the black border. That's purely for aesthetic purposes.)

I'm using Oryx's 1-bit scifi sprites for the art, Gichco's music and these guys for some of the sound effects. I'm also using Daniel Linssen's awesome m5x7 font!
